spec_data.Name: compiz-manager
spec_data.Description:
This script will detect what options we need to pass to compiz to get it
started, and start a default plugin and possibly window decorator.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:31:51 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A wrapper script to start compiz with proper options
